original: 􄑘􅗭􇥗􄖩􈇤􇥗􄗥􄕯􄑜􈉅􇥗􄙘􄖫􄚨􄖩􄚨􄖩􇩴􇩴􄗁􄓚􄗁􈁆􅁥􄚩􇖴以隆🔽僧都本書寫之件本大師御筆云云後日以般若寺僧正御手跡本比交以朱付點本也。
analyzed: 􄑘􅗭􇥗􄖩􈇤􇥗􄗥􄕯􄑜􈉅􇥗􄙘􄖫􄚨􄖩􄚨􄖩􇩴􇩴􄗁􄓚􄗁􈁆􅁥􄚩􇖴以隆🔽僧都本書寫之件本大師御筆云云後日以般若寺僧正御手跡本比交以朱付點本也。
translated: 􄑘􅗭􇥗􄖩􈇤􇥗􄗥􄕯􄑜􈉅􇥗􄙘􄖫􄚨􄖩􄚨􄖩􇩴􇩴􄗁􄓚􄗁􈁆􅁥􄚩􇖴 with prosperity🔽The monk of Hanjura Temple wrote it down. The original text of the Great Master says so and so. Later, the monk of Hanjura Temple compared it with the original text written by the monk of Hanjura Temple and marked it with vermilion.
